title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - September 2, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - September 2, 2021
description:
Mark and Gary discuss the news out of SCOTUS, developments out of Aurora Colorado in the death of Elijah McClain and they wrap up with a lighter story that has delighted Gary to no end.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
